panels.description: Bars represent successful promotions to current-tripleo for master. Default time is the last 2 weeks.

targets.query: select count("repo_hash") as "count", last("repo_hash") as "repo", last("repo_url") as "repo_url" from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'train' and "distro" = 'CentOS-8') group by time(24h), *

panels.title: Days since last component promotion

targets.query: SELECT "job_name","status","criteria","logs","duration","failure_reason","test_hash"  FROM "autogen"."jobs_result" WHERE ("job_type" = 'component' AND "release" = 'train' AND "component" = 'baremetal') AND $timeFilter

panels.description: Bars represent successful promotions to current-tripleo for master. Default time is the last 2 weeks.

targets.query: select count("repo_hash") as "count", last("repo_hash") as "repo", last("repo_url") as "repo_url" from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'train' and "name" = 'promoted-components' and "distro" = 'CentOS-8' and "component" = 'baremetal') group by time(24h), *
